signInPrompt: Sign in to access your farm dashboard.
joinPrompt: Join Fasal Drishti to get started.
aiPerformanceDesc: Accuracy of core prediction and advisory models.
farmerManagementDesc: View and manage farmer accounts and profile data.
adminDashboardDesc: Monitor system health, manage users, and track AI performance.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to update your profile.
profileUpdatedDesc: Your farm profile has been successfully saved.
myFarmProfileDesc: Manage your farm and crop details here.
healthStatusGoodDesc: Your crops are healthy and thriving.
healthStatusAttentionDesc: Some areas need your attention. Check advisories below.
healthStatusProblemDesc: Immediate action is required. Review critical alerts.
marketLinkageDesc: Real-time market prices for your crops.
smartPhotoAnalysisDesc: Upload a photo. I'll diagnose any issues and provide a treatment plan.
noImageDesc: Please select an image to analyze.
analysisFailedDesc: Could not analyze the photo. Please try again.
analysisResultText: Here is the analysis of your crop:
followUpQuestionPrompt: Feel free to ask me any follow-up questions!
chatbotErrorDesc: Failed to get a response. Please try again.
cropAnalysisChatDesc: Review your analysis and ask the AI assistant for more details.
analysisResultsAppearHere: Your analysis results will appear here.
profileIncompleteDesc: Please fill out your farm profile to get personalized advice.
fetchAdviceError: Could not fetch real-time advisory. Please try again.
taskCompletedDesc: Great job staying on top of your farm tasks.
feedbackReceivedDesc: Thank you for helping us improve!
getAdvicePrompt: Click "Get Advice" to generate your personalized action plan.
completeProfilePrompt: Fill out the "My Farm Profile" card to receive AI-powered advice.
takePictureDesc: Position the crop in the frame and capture a clear image.
cameraAccessRequiredDesc: Please allow camera access in your browser to use this feature. You may need to refresh the page.
cameraAccessDeniedDesc: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings.
